keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The government says tens of thousands of people are enrolled in Medicaid even as they receive federal subsidies under the Affordable Care Act.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Health Officials Move to End Duplicate Coverage
headline.main: U.S. Officials Move to End Duplicate Health Care Coverage

snippet: The government says tens of thousands of people are enrolled in Medicaid even as they receive federal subsidies under the Affordable Care Act....
abstract: Obama administration is beginning efforts to make sure those enrolled in Medicaid are not simultaneously receiving federal subsidies to pay for private insurance under health care reform law; effort is in response to Government Accountability Office report documenting potential for duplicate coverage under law.
